trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> row.
A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> row represents a single data item in a bound data source.
Each row contains one cell per column in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>, and each cell displays a single value in the bound data item.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"></xref> class.
Gets the index of the row within a set of alternating rows.
Alternating rows are rows to which you can assign different characteristics, such as alternating background colors.

You can set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> to indicate the number of rows within a set of alternating rows.
For more information about alternating rows, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
Override the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.OnPropertyChanged%2A> method to respond to changes to the AlternationIndex property.

The AlternationIndex property does not have its own property changed method because the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.AlternationIndexProperty> field reuses the read-only <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndexProperty?displayProperty=fullName> field.
The index of the row within a set of alternating rows.
The registered default is 0.
For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.AlternationIndex*> dependency property.
The AlternationIndexProperty field reuses the read-only <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndexProperty?displayProperty=fullName> field.
To be added.
Arranges the content of the row.
The area that is available for the row.
The actual area used by the row.
Gets or sets the template that is used to display the details section of the row.

The template that is used to display the row details section or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowDetailsTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> setting.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsTemplate*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a template selector that provides custom logic for choosing a row details template.
A template selector for choosing the row details template.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsTemplateSelector*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value that indicates when the details section of the row is displayed.
A value that specifies the visibility of the row details.
The registered default is <xref href="System.Windows.Visibility"></xref>.
For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsVisibility*> dependency property.
To be added.
Returns the index of the row's data item within the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>.
The index of the row's data item, or -1 if the item was not found.
Returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"></xref> that contains the specified element.
An element contained in a row to be found.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"></xref> that contains the specified element.
Gets or sets an object that represents the row header contents.
The row header contents.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Header*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the style that is used when rendering the row header.
To define a <xref:System.Windows.Style> for a row header, specify a <xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridRowHeader>.
A <xref:System.Windows.Style> can be applied to all row headers, or to an individual row header.

To apply a <xref:System.Windows.Style> to an individual header set the HeaderStyle property, which takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowHeaderStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
The style that is used when rendering the row header.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.HeaderStyle*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the template that is used to display the row header.

The template that is used to display the row header or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowHeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> setting.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.HeaderTemplate*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a template selector that provides custom logic for choosing a row header template.
A template selector for choosing the row header template.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.HeaderTemplateSelector*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets a value that indicates whether the row is in editing mode.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row is in editing mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsEditing*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"></xref> is a placeholder for a new item or for an item that has not been committed.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"></xref> is a placeholder for a new item or for an item that has not been committed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsNewItem*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the row is selected.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row is selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsSelected*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the data item that the row represents.
The data item that the row represents.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Item*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the template that defines the panel that controls the layout of cells in the row.
The template that defines the panel to use for the layout of cells in the row.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.ItemsPanel*> dependency property.
To be added.
Called to update the displayed cells when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection has changed.
The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.

The event data from the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.CollectionChanged> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
Returns a new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridRowAutomationPeer"></xref> for this row.
A new automation peer for this row.
Called when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Header*> property has changed.
The previous value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Header*> property.
The new value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Header*> property.
Updates the displayed cells when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Item*> property value has changed.
The previous value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Item*> property.
The new value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Item*> property.
Invoked whenever the effective value of any dependency property on this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"></xref> has been updated.
This method overrides <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnPropertyChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
The specific dependency property that changed is reported in the arguments parameter.
Override this method to respond to changes to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.AlternationIndex%2A> property.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.AlternationIndex%2A> property does not have its own property changed method because the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.AlternationIndexProperty> field reuses the read-only <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndexProperty?displayProperty=fullName> field.
The event data that describes the property that changed, as well as old and new values.

Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Selected"></xref> event when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsSelected*> property value changes to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
The OnSelected method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
The event data, which is empty when this method is called by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"></xref>.
Called whenever the control's template changes.
The old template.
The new template.

Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Unselected"></xref> event when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsSelected*> property value changes to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
The OnUnselected method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
The event data, which is empty when this method is called by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"></xref>.
Occurs when the row is selected.
This event occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsSelected%2A> property value changes to `true`.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Selected"></xref> routed event.
To be added.
Occurs when the row selection is cleared.
This event occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsSelected%2A> property value changes to `false`.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Unselected"></xref> routed event.
To be added.
Gets or sets the template that is used to visually indicate an error in row validation.

The template that is used to visually indicate an error in row validation, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowValidationErrorTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> setting.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.ValidationErrorTemplate*> dependency property.
To be added.
